```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
holmdelLatLng <- data.frame(
  lat = c(40.364462, 40.392664, 40.348274, 40.390480),
  lng = c(-74.167176, -74.176037, -74.187811, -74.184579)
)
holmdelSites <- c("<a href='http://bell.works'>Bell Works</a>",
                  "<a href='http://pncbankartscenter.org'>PNC Arts Center</a>",
                  "<a href='https://www.vonage.com'>Vonage</a>",
                  "<a href='https://www.sciencefriday.com/articles/the-antenna-that-detected-the-big-bang'>Horn Antenna</a>"
)
holmdelLatLng %>% leaflet()  %>% addTiles() %>% addMarkers(popup= holmdelSites) 
```
